...The Maestro Hook is a simple conversation hook...

Japanese people like to go barhopping...
...and they drink in a lot of different places like...
But in the West, most people like to drink in one place.
They stay in one place and they don't go to different bars so much.
But in Japan, we call that barhopping, so please remember this word.
